full_summary:
# Real Estate Brokerage Services for the Embassy of Canada in Mexico City

**Tender ID**: 24-259200
**Closing Date**: July 29, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

## Summary
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade, and Development (DFATD) is seeking a supplier to provide real estate brokerage services for the sale of up to 6 Crown-owned residential properties in Mexico City, Mexico.

## Description
This Request for Proposal (RFP) aims to select a supplier to provide real estate brokerage services to sell up to 6 Crown-owned residential properties located in residential building in Polanco, CDMX. The properties will be sold in accordance with the interests of the Government of Canada and in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

## Requirements
**Deadline to Submit Proposal**: The proposal must be submitted by 2:00 PM (EST) on July 29, 2024.

**Evaluation Criteria**:

* Lowest Cost-per-Point
* Responsiveness to the terms and conditions outlined in the RFP
* Experience of the supplier in providing similar real estate brokerage services

## Important Notes
* Suppliers must comply with the Trade Agreements listed in the RFP.
* Suppliers must have experience in the real estate brokerage business and have completed successful sales transactions in Mexico.

## Contact Information
* Brent Hygaard
* realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
* (343) 573-5242

## Attachments
Please visit [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) for a copy of the RFP, Questions and Answers, and other related documents.

Note that some relevant details were excluded for brevity. For more information, please refer to the original document provided by the contractor.
